headline: Top AI Stocks to Add to Your Portfolio for Impressive Returns
summary: Here, we have picked three AI stocks, MSFT, CTSH and LRCX, which are well poised to benefit from AI's growing usage and ability to solve complex problems.

headline: Lam Research: Neutral With Technology Tailwinds Priced In
summary: Lam's leadership in gate-all-around, HBM, and advanced packaging supports above-consensus FY26 earnings. Read why upside catalysts are lacking for LRCX stock.
